issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.summary: Getting an error while trying to run app on Windows 8
fields.environment: I am getting this issue on windows 8

comments.body:
Hi ,
I tested the issue you reported. It looks like the feature "Run an Apps " in Appcelerator Studio  on windows 8 is working fine for me. I tested this using the [studio build: 4.1.1.201507141126|https://web.appcelerator.com/product/studio] and TiSDK 4.1.0 GA
I recommend you upgrade studio to the latest build and let us know if you get the error again.
I will mark this ticket as "resolved" since I can't reproduce it. However, feel free to reopen with additional information such as *Diagnostic Log* if you notice otherwise.
Thanks
